issue.title: [Python] Update kernel categories in compute doc to match C++
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14012](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14012). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Noticed that **Structural Transforms** do not have the same kernel listing in compute documentation between [C++](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/docs/source/cpp/compute.rst) and [Python](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/docs/source/python/api/compute.rst). Update the Python docs to be consistent with C++ kernel categorization.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14012?focusedCommentId=17420881) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11237
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11237>
